item.title: Australians stunned as snow blankets parts of Tasmania on Christmas Day
item.description: ‘One of my lifelong dreams of experiencing an Australian white Christmas has finally come true.’

item.title: Weddings of the year: Aussie sports stars edition
item.description: Olympic swimmers, jockeys, soccer players and AFL veterans were among the big names who said ‘I do’.

item.title: From cancer ward to kitchen bench: Tom’s cookies lift spirits for Camp Quality Christmas Appeal
item.description: When he is not undergoing intensive cancer treatment, four-year-old Tom loves to bake.

item.title: Australia ramps up bans on hard‑to-recycle items with sweeping rules by 2026
item.description: The fish-shaped soy sauce bottle, the bread bag tag, and even the tiny ‘pizza table’ are all on the endangered list.

item.title: Young Maddie’s foot ‘fracture’ turned out to be deadly and just days later her dad was also diagnosed with cancer
item.description: ‘My whole world started spinning around me.’

item.title: Backpackers still party at Sydney beaches weeks after terror attack
item.description: Weeks after the Bondi attack, celebrations have taken over the beaches once more.

item.title: Light Up Christmas winners!
item.description: The winners will receive $5,000 thanks to Alinta Energy*.

item.title: King Charles calls for ‘unity’ in annual Christmas broadcast in the wake of anti-Semitic attacks in Bondi, Manchester
item.description: ‘We can find the strength to ensure that right triumphs over wrong.’

item.title: Mystery person wins $20 million Powerball jackpot on Christmas night
item.description: The new multi-millionaire is yet to come forward.

item.title: Crane fall above Christmas campers prompts caravan park evacuation as power cut to Gold Coast homes
item.description: Plans to disassemble the dangling crane come amid more severe weather.

item.title: Stabbing death in Perth shopping centre carpark prompts homicide probe
item.description: The victim was found outside an Aubin Grove IGA and bottle shop.

item.title: Ashes live: Aussies all out for 152 on Day 1 of Boxing Day Test against England
item.description: Follow all the big moments from the MCG as Australia and England clash in the fourth Test.

item.title: Save on summer favourites with major 40 per cent off sale at MCM House
item.description: From easy outdoor living to laid-back indoor icons, there’s something for everyone.

item.title: ‘Leave now’: Urgent warning as blaze threatens Bannister, Ranford, Boddington, Marradong, Lower Hotham and Wuraming
item.description: ‘You are in danger and need to act immediately to survive.’

item.title: Canberra teenager arrested after allegedly performing Nazi salute in public, spreading propaganda
item.description: ‘Antisemitism is a cancer that requires swift and direct action.’

item.title: Dyson looklike hair dryer with over 1000 purchases this month now under $70 for Boxing Day
item.description: ‘This is the best hair dryer I have ever owned.’

item.title: Save big on Samsung fridges, washers and top-rated TVs up to $2000 off this Boxing Day
item.description: ‘It’s like having a cinema at home.’

item.title: Woman charged with high range drink driving after crashing car with kids inside on Christmas Day
item.description: Police say the woman was three times over the legal blood alcohol limit.

item.title: Australian swimmer Emily Seebohm posts emotional Christmas video following split from Ryan Gallagher
item.description: ‘Feels like the magic is gone without him. It’s hard.’

item.title: Two Bondi terror attack victims still critical two weeks after shooting at Sydney beach
item.description: Eleven people remain in hospital almost two weeks after the terror attack.

item.title: Princess Catherine plays piano with Princess Charlotte for special Christmas carols duet
item.description: The mother and daughter have sat down for an adorable Christmas duet.

item.title: Driver killed as panel van rolls off road at Merredin in WA’s Wheatbelt
item.description: The man in his 60s was on a remote country road when his car veered off.

item.title: Coogee Beach clean-up: More than 20 tonnes of rubbish left from notorious Christmas Day backpacker party
item.description: ‘There is no excuse for people to litter like this.’

item.title: Pat Cummins turns focus to T20 World Cup after helping Aussies win Ashes
item.description: The 32-year-old has revealed his next steps after helping the Aussies win the Ashes.

item.title: Police name suspect after Melbourne rabbi’s car firebombed in St Kilda on Christmas Day
item.description: A photo of the person police want to speak to has been released as officers urge anyone who knows where he is to contact authorities.

item.title: Princess Eugenie and Princess Beatrice attend Christmas Day service at Sandringham without their father Andrew
item.description: The sisters put on a defiant display amid the ongoing fallout from their father’s scandals.

item.title: Sydney to Hobart fleet pay tribute to Bondi victims by scattering rose petals
item.description: The 129-strong fleet scattered rose petals off the coast of Bondi Beach as they passed early in the race.

item.title: Nicki Minaj deletes Instagram after comments made during sit-down with Charlie Kirk’s widow Erika Kirk
item.description: The singer also praised Donald Trump in the interview, calling him ‘handsome’ and ‘dashing’.

item.title: Queensland set to be smashed by more rain as large areas put on flood watch
item.description: The heavy rainfall could lead to a “protracted flood event” across large parts of the state.

item.title: Man allegedly stabbed to death in Northern Territory community of Laramba
item.description: Police are working to identify the alleged offender.
